alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Montgomery; Moore; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Moore, northwestern Montgomery, Randolph and western Chatham Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Asheboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rainfall, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Asheboro, Randleman, North Carolina Zoo, Siler City, Badin Lake, Goldston, Seagrove, Ramseur, Franklinville and Staley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
